mapper.select: select id, teacher_id, subject_id, title, price, lesson_num, cover, buy_count, view_count, version, status, gmt_create, gmt_modified from edu_course where id=#{id}

SELECT c.title, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) as price, c.cover, s1.title as subjectLevelTwo, s2.title as subjectLevelOne, COUNT( c.title ) as lessonPublishCount, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, t.`name` as teacherName FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_video v ON c.id = v.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON t.id = c.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON s1.id = c.subject_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON s1.parent_id = s2.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
SELECT * FROM edu_course WHERE subject_id IN (SELECT id FROM edu_subject WHERE parent_id = #{subjectId} )

SELECT c.id id, c.`title` courseTitle, ROUND(c.`price`, 2) coursePrice, c.`lesson_num` lessonNum, c.`buy_count` buyCount, c.`cover` courseCover, c.`view_count` viewCount, cd.`description` description, s2.title secondSubjectTitle, s2.`id` secondSubjectId, s1.title firstSubjectTitle, s1.`id` firstSubjectId, t.`id` teacherId, t.`name` teacherName, t.`avatar` teacherAvatar, t.`intro` teacherIntroduce, t.`career` teacherCareer FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON s2.`id` = c.`subject_id` LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON s1.`id` = s2.`parent_id` LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON cd.`id` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON t.`id` = c.`teacher_id` WHERE c.id = #{id}
